name: libmupass
description: Automated museum pass reservation service for KCLS

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/api && npm run lint --workspace=apps/web
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=apps/api && npm run format --workspace=apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/api && npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/web
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules apps/api/node_modules apps/api/dist apps/web/node_modules apps/web/dist
